pma:database.name: mqalc
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `cats` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `num` int(10) NOT NULL, `clef_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
CREATE TABLE `clefs` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, `name_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
